data.text: @Theo_TJ_Jordan @5DSoul And people of colour being inconvenienced in trying to move around - woah, democracy in action

@Theo_TJ_Jordan @SundanceConstr1 At this point, if they want to point the Memetic Cannon at anything that's not WW3, I'll take it. You want to freak out about black people voting? Fine, whatever. 

But it needs to be dismantled afterwards.

@SundanceConstr1 @Theo_TJ_Jordan I know nothing about Russia, but I wouldn't be surprised. Putin's invasion speech, whatever you think of him or his motives, was far more sophisticated and erudite than anything coming from a US pol.

@Theo_TJ_Jordan We need better education within our populations. This is what it boils down to. Knowledge is power, but controlling knowledge - even more power. 
The avg Russian is far more classically educated across the board. Science, history, geopolitics, math, music, arts.
@holidayyy_games @Buster_iii Marvel movie, indeed. With a heavy splash of satisfying that need for a tribal fix.
@Kristinf78 @Theo_TJ_Jordan Has the idiot box told them to do that?  If msnbc organized the flights it’d be a go.
@Buster_iii @Theo_TJ_Jordan Yep it’s a marvel movie to them

@Theo_TJ_Jordan This's not healthy. This level of anxiety over something on the other side of the world- it seems like they've taken on the role of "protector"/"ally" so much so they actually feel guilty about their own safety...

It's like they have survivors guilt for people they've never met.
